General.Name: GameLoft S.E
General.Description: Gameloft SE creates and publishes downloadable video games for mobile phones, touch tablets, set-top boxes, and smart TVs worldwide. It provides action, adventure, racing, sports, strategy, simulation, brain training, card, board games, puzzle, arcade, and MMORPG genre games. The company offers approximately 385 Gameloft games that can be downloaded on 300 models of feature phones; and 175 smartphone and touch tablet games. It also owns various franchises. The company distributes its products through online stores, telephone manufacturers, telecom operators, and Internet service providers and television manufacturers' app stores, as well as through its Websites. Gameloft SE was founded in 1999 and is based in Paris, France. As of June 15, 2016, GameLoft S.E. operates as a subsidiary of Vivendi SA.
